metadata.Title: CVE-2016-2152 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in auth/db/auth.php in Moodle through 2.6.11, 2.7.x before 2.7.13, 2.8.x before 2.8.11, 2.9.x before 2.9.5, and 3.0.x before 3.0.3 allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via an external DB profile field.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-2152` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

moodle - 2.7.13+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: moodle package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.7.13+dfsg-1').
